m_szDocTitle: A (hopefully) quick end to a bear market, and nine other money stories you may have missed - MarketWatch
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- National news A (hopefully) quick end to a bear market, and nine other money stories you may have missed Published: Jan 17, 2016 10:32 a.m. ET Share These 10 stories are among the most interesting published by MarketWatch this week By Investing columnist Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images What may be good news for investors is that bear markets for U.S. stocks tend to end soon after reaching a 20% decline. MarketWatch rounded up 10 of the most interesting money stories published over the past week that readers might have overlooked. Bear markets tend to end quickly
